characters.name: Gilgamesh
characters.motto: Un alma, naturalmente, busca el placer, conscientemente o no. Ese deseo interno se expresa a través de los propios intereses y preocupaciones.

characters.name: Saber
characters.motto: ¿De que vale un rey que no protege la autoridad? Una regla justa, con leyes justas... ¡Estos son los verdaderos deberes de un rey!

characters.name: Cú Chulainn
characters.motto: ¿Quién iba a pensar que en un día mataría dos veces a la misma persona? Supongo que el mundo de los humanos siempre será igual de sangriento.

characters.name: Shoto Todoroki
characters.motto: If you wanna stop this, then stand up! Because I've just got one thing to say to you! Never forget who you want to become!

characters.name: Saitama
characters.motto: 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 100 squats, and a 10km run EVERY SINGLE DAY!!!

characters.name: Eijiro Kirishima
characters.motto: When I heard that they were after my buddy...I couldn't do anything!! I didn't do anything!! If I don't act now...forget being a hero, I'm not even a man!

characters.name: Shouta Aizawa
characters.motto: I'm sorry to tell you... that for the next three years... U.A. will run you through the wringer. That's "Plus Ultra". Use your strength to overcome it all. So bring it

characters.name: Izuku Midoriya
characters.motto: I'm not gonna be your worthless punching bag Deku forever... Kacchan. I'm... I'm the Deku who always does his best!
